Workpackages

PeT-HMR is divided in six workpackages.

  • Workpackage 1: Investigation and choice of AI methods
  • Workpackage 2: Smart Honeypot and data collection
  • Workpackage 3: Automation of penetration tests
  • Workpackage 4: Integration of APeT and SHoP
  • Workpackage 5: Patch generation
  • Workpackage 6: Evaluation and demonstrator
